snippet: The Knicks guard Jeremy Lin is the first player from an Ivy League university to suit up for an N.B.A. team since the 2002-3 season.
abstract: New York Knicks guard Jeremy Lin is the first player from an Ivy League university to join an NBA team since the 2002-3 season, and the first from Harvard since the 1953-54 season.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks guard Jeremy Lin is the first player from an Ivy League university to suit up for an N.B.A. team since the 2002-3 season.

headline.seo: For Ivy League Players, the N.B.A. Is Rarely a Destination
headline.main: For Lin, a Rare Harvard Career Path
headline.print_headline: For Lin, A Rare Harvard Career Path
